entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -25.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 12:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -25.1°C
Pressure: 103.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: -27.8°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
